text: North West Frontier (USA: Flame Over India; Australia: Empress of India) is a 1959 British adventure movie directed by J. Lee Thompson and stars Kenneth More, Lauren Bacall, Herbert Lom, Ursula Jeans, Wilfrid Hyde-White, I. S. Johar. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox and was nominated for 3 BAFTAS in 1960. ==Other websites== * * Category:1959 adventure movies Category:British adventure movies Category:Movies set in India Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by J. Lee Thompson
title: North West Frontier (movie)
